title: CVS Health 's revenue 2010 - 2017 by segment
summary: Overall Pharmacy services, and Retail pharmacy are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Revenue in billion USD, in descending order is: 1. Pharmacy services, and lastly, 2. Retail pharmacy.
The minimum Revenue in billion USD about 63.65, occured at 2012 by Retail pharmacy.
The greatest difference of Revenue in billion USD between Pharmacy services and Retail pharmacy occurs at Year 2015 and the smallest difference occurs at 2012.
min_summary: Overall Pharmacy services, and Retail pharmacy are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
mid_summary: Overall Pharmacy services, and Retail pharmacy are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
max_summary: Overall Pharmacy services, and Retail pharmacy are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
Retail pharmacy reported the lowest Revenue in billion USD about 63.65 in Year 2012
The difference of Revenue in billion USD between Pharmacy services and Retail pharmacy is greater at Year 2015 compared to the Year 2012.
